fields.name: AlertDisplayName
fields.description: The display name of the alert.

fields.name: AlertType
fields.description: Unique identifier for the detection logic (all alert instances from the same detection logic will have the same alertType).

fields.name: AlertUri
fields.description: A direct link to the alert page in Azure Portal.

fields.name: CompromisedEntity
fields.description: The display name of the resource most related to this alert.

fields.name: CorrelationKey
fields.description: Key for corelating related alerts. Alerts with the same correlation key considered to be related.

fields.name: Description
fields.description: Description of the suspicious activity that was detected.

fields.name: EndTimeUtc
fields.description: The UTC time of the last event or activity included in the alert in ISO8601 format.

fields.name: Entities
fields.description: A list of entities related to the alert.

fields.name: ExtendedLinks
fields.description: Links related to the alert

fields.name: ExtendedProperties
fields.description: Custom properties for the alert.

fields.name: Intent
fields.description: The kill chain related intent behind the alert. For list of supported values, and explanations of Azure Security Center's supported kill chain intents.

fields.name: IsIncident
fields.description: This field determines whether the alert is an incident (a compound grouping of several alerts) or a single alert.

fields.name: ProcessingEndTimeUtc
fields.description: The UTC processing end time of the alert in ISO8601 format.

fields.name: ProductComponentName
fields.description: The name of Azure Security Center pricing tier which powering this alert. Learn more: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/security-center/security-center-pricing

fields.name: ProductName
fields.description: The name of the product which published this alert (Azure Security Center, Azure ATP, Microsoft Defender ATP, O365 ATP, and so on).

fields.name: RemediationSteps
fields.description: Manual action items to take to remediate the alert.

fields.name: ResourceIdentifiers
fields.description: The resource identifiers that can be used to direct the alert to the right product exposure group (tenant, workspace, subscription etc.). There can be multiple identifiers of different type per alert.

fields.name: Severity
fields.description: The risk level of the threat that was detected. Learn more: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/security-center/security-center-alerts-overview#how-are-alerts-classified.

fields.name: StartTimeUtc
fields.description: The UTC time of the first event or activity included in the alert in ISO8601 format.

fields.name: Status
fields.description: The life cycle status of the alert.

fields.name: SystemAlertId
fields.description: Unique identifier for the alert.

fields.name: TimeGeneratedUtc
fields.description: The UTC time the alert was generated in ISO8601 format.

fields.name: VendorName
fields.description: The name of the vendor that raises the alert.
